about_the_game:
Game Background
This is an era of chaos and chaos. Years of war have left the people struggling, and all forces in the Central Plains are fighting their own battles. In the darkness, the imprisoned and expelled evil forces are just about to move, and they will never give up this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to make a comeback. In such a chaotic world, the protagonist you play is still acting as a chivalrous person according to your own strength, and in this chaotic world, you are not only facing the evil forces of darkness.

Game Features
This is a third-person RPG action fighting game, in which you will complete a series of tasks along the game plot and defeat the enemy.
The protagonist of the game is a young male warrior. The main gameplay is to clear various skills to kill the enemy, as well as rebound, dodge, and jump to avoid the enemy's attack. Using various active and passive skills, you will become more powerful.
